price: Cada qual nada fez senão desmentir os Mensageiros. Então, minha punição cumpriu-se.
arabic: إِن كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: in kullun illā kadhaba al-rusula faḥaqqa ʿiqābi
